CustomField.description: Check if the passenger is ROP member with matching last name and date of birth
CustomField.formula: AND(FFP_Carrier__c == 'TG', AccountId__r.ROP_Number__c != null, AccountId__c != null, AccountId__r.Last_Name__c == Last_Name__c, AccountId__r.Date_of_Birth__c == Date_of_Birth_Input__c)
CustomField.label: Match with ROP
